ModMetaData.name: Insectoids Evolved
ModMetaData.author: NilchEi
ModMetaData.description:
Insectoids are granted access to upgrades inspired by Starcraft 1:
Megascarab can replicate using corpses and have shorter lifespan. Spelopede can cast Dark Swarm. Megaspider can come in slower but armored variants.
Insectoids have 40% chance to gain their respecitve abilities every birthday.
